content: *striped or solid this no-nonsense pattern will get you familiar with cuff-down socks on double-pointed needles shown in patons classic wool dk superwash patons yarns * skill level intermediate **note although the linked pattern is titled patons basic socks striped i - child 2/4 all sizes are there in the download ** **sizes ** size / to fit shoe size / finished foot length * child 2-4 years / 1/2 / 5½ 14 cm * child 6-8 years / 3/4 / 6½ 16 5 cm * woman small / 5/6 / 8 20 5 cm * woman medium / 7/8 / 9 23 cm * man large / 9/10 / 10 25 5 cm **yarn requirements ** patons® classic wool dk superwash™ 1 75 oz/50 g \ **2/4**-6/8-**s**-m-**l**\ *solid version shown on adult * #12705 red **1**-1-**2**-2-**2 ball s ** *striped version i shown on child 2/4 * * contrast a #12008 aran **1 ball** * contrast b #12134 royal blue **1 ball** * *2 colors 1 ball each* *striped version ii shown on child 6/8 * * contrast a #12134 royal blue **1 ball** * contrast b #12008 aran **1 ball** * *2 colors 1 ball each* **additional materials ** * set of four size 3 5 mm us 4 double-pointed knitting needles * stitch holder * stitch marker grafting diagram is included in pdf download july 2012
